character_info.name: Ensis Caelum
character_info.proficiencies: Light Armor, Simple Weapons, Land Vehicles

0.name: War Caster
0.description:
You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands.

When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

1.name: Spell Sniper
1.description:
When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell's range is doubled.

Your ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll. Choose the cantrip from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list. Your spellcasting ability for this cantrip depends on the spell list you chose from: Charisma for bard, sorcerer, and warlock; Wisdom for cleric or druid; or Intelligence for wizard.

0.name: Appraiser's Eye
0.description:
Charges: 3/3 (recharge 1d3 every day at dawn)

Cast identify at will using an action

1.name: Welshkeveen the Imp
1.description: Can sense what the imp senses within 1 mile. While the imp is within 10 feet, master shares imp's Magic Resistance trait. If its master violates the terms of the contract, the imp can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

4.name: Quaal's Feather Token (Anchor)
4.description: Action to touch token to a boat or ship. For next 24 hours, vessel can't be moved by any means. Touching token to vessel again ends Effect. When Effect ends, the token disappears.

5.name: Eagle Whistle
5.description:
Uses: 3/3 (regains expended uses daily at dawn)

While blowing continuously, can fly twice as fast as walking speed. Can blow continuously for rounds equal to 5 + five times CON mod or until you talk, hold your breath, or start suffocating. Also ends if you land. If you are aloft when you stop blowing the whistle, you fall. The whistle has three uses. It regains expended uses daily at dawn.

6.name: Darklight Orb
6.description: Double range on ranged spell attacks, +1 to attack and damage rolls for ranged spell attacks, can choose to deal radiant, fire, or necrotic instead of normal damage (only for ranged spell attacks, includes cantrips)

0.name: Eldritch Invocations
0.description:
Eldritch Spear
Mask of Many Faces
Agonizing Blast (add CHA mod to dmg)
Misty Visions (cast Silent Image at will)

1.name: Metamagics
1.description:
Quicken - When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, you can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

Twinned - spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to target a second creature in range with the same spell (1 sorcery point if the spell is a cantrip).

Heightened - spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw made against the spell

2.name: Healing Hands
2.description:
1 Action / Range: Touch / 1x per Long Rest

Heal HP equal to your level

3.name: Radiant Consumption
3.description:
1 Action / 1x per Long Rest

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take radiant damage equal to half your level (rounded up). In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.

4.name: Favored by the Gods
4.description:
1x per Short or Long Rest

Starting at 1st level, divine power guards your destiny. If you fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, you can roll 2d4 and add it to the total, possibly changing the outcome.

5.name: Empowered Healing
5.description: Whenever you or an ally within 5 feet of you rolls dice to determine the number of hit points a spell restores, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll any number of those dice once, provided you aren’t incapacitated. You can use this feature only once per turn.

6.name: Dark One's Blessing
6.description: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your warlock level (minimum of 1).

7.name: Devil Claws
7.description:
Bonus action: morph one or both of your hands into devil claws.
Claws are simple melee weapons (light) and they deal 1d6+5 slashing damage on hit. You can use Charisma instead of Strength for your attack and damage rolls made with these claws.

8.name: Dark One's Own Luck
8.description:
1x per Short or Long Rest

When you make an ability check or a saving throw, you can add a d10 to your roll. You can do so after seeing the initial roll but before any of the roll’s effects occur.

9.name: Summon Tree
9.description:
1 Action / 1x per Long Rest
Summon a Medium sized Animated Tree that stays up for a number of hours equal to proficiency bonus

notes: - Testing at dungeon was connected to "Project Nemesis" and "U.C"
